Package org.robotalons.lib.vision

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
org.robotalons.lib.vision.Camera
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public abstract class Camera extends Object implements Closeable

Singular unit which assists in the odometry and kinematics of a given robot.

  • Constructor Details

    • Camera

      protected Camera(edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTable Instance, edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform3d Relative, String Identifier)
      Camera Constructor
      Parameters:
      Instance - Network table instance for raw object data to be retrieved from
      Relative - Robot relative offset of the camera from the center of the robot's base
      Identifier - Name of this camera, not bound by the type of camera it implements upon

  • Method Details

    • periodic

      public abstract void periodic()
      This method is called periodically by the CommandScheduler. Useful for updating subsystem-specific state that you don't want to offload to a Command. Teams should try to be consistent within their own codebase about which responsibilities will be handled by Commands, and which will be handled here.

    • update

      public abstract void update()
      Updates the underlying signals within this module

    • snapshotInput

      public abstract void snapshotInput()
      Forces the camera to take a preprocessed snapshot of it's current processed feed.

    • snapshotOutput

      public abstract void snapshotOutput()
      Forces the camera to take a preprocessed snapshot of it's current processed feed.

    • request

      public Object request(String Topic) throws NullPointerException
      Requests raw object metadata from the raw network table instance of the camera
      Parameters:
      Topic - Name of the requested topic as a string value
      Returns:
      Value of the requested topic as an object, which must be cast to the corresponding datatype
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the value requested does not exist within the network tables instance

    • close

      public abstract void close() throws IOException
      Closes this instance and all held resources immediately, but does not render the class unusable hence forth and can be re-instantiated.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in interface Closeable
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getObjectFieldPose

      public Optional<edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d> getObjectFieldPose(edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform2d Target)
      Provides the robot relative position to a given object based on the estimated position of this camera and a transformation to a known object
      Parameters:
      Target - Transformation to a given target anywhere on the field
      Returns:
      Position of the object relative to the field

    • getObjectFieldPose

      public Optional<edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d> getObjectFieldPose()
      Provides the robot relative position to a given object based on the estimated position of this camera and a transformation assuming that the desired object is the optimal target of this camera.
      Returns:
      Position of the object relative to the field

    • getStandardDeviations

      public abstract edu.wpi.first.math.Matrix<edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N3,edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N1> getStandardDeviations()
      Provides the confidence or standard deviation of the cameras evaluations of estimations
      Returns:
      Matrix of standard deviations of estimation

    • getCameraMatrix

      public abstract Optional<edu.wpi.first.math.Matrix<edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N3,edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N3>> getCameraMatrix()
      Provides the matrix of this camera's hardware data, distortion, etc.
      Returns:
      Optional value that may exist of the camera's hardware data

    • getCoefficientMatrix

      public abstract Optional<edu.wpi.first.math.Matrix<edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N5,edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N1>> getCoefficientMatrix()
      Provides the coefficient matrix of the distance camera relative to the current target
      Returns:
      Optional value that may exist of the camera's distance coefficients

    • getRobotPositionTimestamps

      public double[] getRobotPositionTimestamps()
      Provides the robot relative position timestamps of each delta from the last update control cycle up to the current query.
      Returns:
      List of robot relative snapshot time deltas

    • getRobotPositionDeltas

      public edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d[] getRobotPositionDeltas()
      Provides the robot relative (minus offset) position deltas from last update control cycle up to the current query.
      Returns:
      List of Poses of the robot since the last control cycle

    • getRobotPosition

      public abstract Optional<edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose3d> getRobotPosition()
      Provides the robot relative (minus offset) position immediately.
      Returns:
      Current estimated Pose of the robot at this moment

    • getRobotOffset

      public edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform3d getRobotOffset()
      Provides the offset of this camera relative to the center of the robot.
      Returns:
      Permanent offset of the robot relative to the center of the robot

    • getTargets

      public List<edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform2d> getTargets()
      Provides a list of robot-relative transformations to the best target within view of the camera
      Returns:
      List of robot-relative target transformations

    • hasTargets

      public boolean hasTargets()
      Provides a boolean representation of if the module has an april tag / object detected
      Returns:
      List of robot-relative target transformations

    • getOptimalTarget

      public Optional<edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform2d> getOptimalTarget()
      Provides the robot-relative transformation to the best target within view of the camera
      Returns:
      Robot-relative best target transformation

    • getTargetCount

      public int getTargetCount()
      Provides the number of targets that is detected within the view of the camera
      Returns:
      Number of targets detected by camera

    • getName

      public abstract String getName()
      Provides the identifier name of this camera, which is separate from the actual name on network tables
      Returns:
      String representation of the camera's name

    • getConnected

      public Boolean getConnected()
      Provides a boolean representation of if the module is still connected to the system and all signals are okay.
      Returns:
      Boolean representing Connectivity
